name: Seek
description:
In the age of Enlightenment (1700-1800), Damien, husband and father, is returning to his home village after receiving a letter from his wife. Upon arrival he began to experience hallucinations and memory loss. Fearing for his family he enters the village and discovers the horrifying truth...

Seek is an indie survival horror played from a first-person perspective. Seek is an adventure game in the style of Amnesia & Outlast. Seek is developed by an independent video game company located in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. Demo version is out now! and shows a preview of Seek.

Full version is in progress.
Demo version out now!!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AtticBoxGames
